channel.title: Okay I seriously need help with shops
channel.description:
Okay, whenever I try to put in a shop, I do everything correct, but when I try to talk to the npc, the shop doesn't come up
I put this in client.java under both first click and second click, used 41 because it was the next number on the shop list [code]else if (NPCID == 608) { // White Knight Salesman PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 41; //White Knight Sales }[/code]
I put this under autospawn.cfg [code]spawn = 608 3251 3430 0 3251 3430 3251 3430 2 White Knight[/code] and this under shop.cfg [code]shop = 41 White_Sales 2 2 6522 10000 6523 100 6524 100 6525 100 6526 100 6527 100 6528 100 6569 100 6571 100 6572 100 6573 100 6575 100 6577 100 6579 100 6581 100 6570 100[/code]
can anyone help me fix this error. please. kinda desperate at this point.

item.title: Okay I seriously need help with shops
item.dc:creator: @slugger7myers slugger7myers
item.description:
@slugger7myers wrote:

Okay, whenever I try to put in a shop, I do everything correct, but when I try to talk to the npc, the shop doesn’t come up

I put this in client.java under both first click and second click, used 41 because it was the next number on the shop list

else if (NPCID == 608) { // White Knight Salesman PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 41; //White Knight Sales }

I put this under autospawn.cfg

spawn = 608	3251	3430	0	3251	3430	3251	3430	2	White Knight

and this under shop.cfg

shop = 41	White_Sales	2	2	6522	10000	6523	100	6524	100	6525	100	6526	100	6527	100	6528	100	6569	100	6571	100	6572	100	6573	100	6575	100	6577	100	6579	100	6581	100	6570	100

can anyone help me fix this error. please. kinda desperate at this point.
